dict.string: (A) The man is adjusting a TV set. (B) The man is wearing gloves and glasses. (C) The man is trying to light a fire. (D) The man is holding a book in his left hand.

(A) The picture shows the facade of a modern office block. (B) The solar energy panels are turned towards the sun. (C) Some of the panels seem to be broken. (D) You can't see any shadows in the picture.
(A) All the buildings are painted white. (B) There are two gondolas in the picture. (C) The gondolier is standing up in the gondola. (D) The sky is very dark.
(A) The man holds a fish in his hand. (B) The man is standing between rocks. (C) The sea is completely calm. (D) You can see several vessels on the horizon.
(A) There are three people in the picture. (B) You can see the shadow of the barrier on the ground. (C) The man is walking away from the camera. (D) The street lamps are all on.
(A) All three children are holding on to the bar. (B) The girl's feet are touching the ground. (C) The children are standing on an escalator. (D) The children are holding each other.
(A) Both women are wearing black shoes. (B) Both women are jogging with their heads up. (C) There are no trees in the picture. (D) The grass looks very brown.
(A) Both fighters are standing upright. (B) Both fighters are sitting in easy chairs. (C) One of the fighters is riding a bike. (D) You can see one of the fighters holding his épée.
(A) The pipe has no visible means of support. (B) There are no bushes either side of the picture. (C) You can see some bands round the pipe. (D) There are some people walking along the path.
(A) Two of the people are wearing black backpacks. (B) The baby being held appears to be crying. (C) The mountain tops in the background are covered with snow. (D) It looks like it's about to rain.
(A) The man is using a screwdriver. (B) The man is using a spanner. (C) The man is using one hand only. (D) The man is standing upright.
(A) The man and the woman are both using paint brushes. (B) They are painting the roof of the house. (C) The man is wearing a white top. (D) The woman is using a paint roller.
(A) All the wheelie bins in the picture are green. (B) The man is bareheaded. (C) The refuse collector is wearing orange trousers. (D) All the wheelie bin lids are closed.

(A) The man on the right has only one leg. (B) The man nearest the camera is holding a golf stick. (C) The man nearest the camera is wearing a helmet. (D) The man on the right is throwing two balls in the air.
(A) The picture shows a swimming pool in someone's backyard. (B) All the sun loungers are blue. (C) There are two people swimming. (D) It looks like a storm is about to start.
(A) The streets are packed with cars. (B) The tower in the picture is an office building. (C) The picture was taken at night. (D) It looks like a beautiful day to be outside.
(A) The camel is looking at the camera. (B) The man is wearing a brown top. (C) The camel is taking a rest. (D) The man is sitting up.
(A) It looks like a very cold day. (B) The man is wearing a white cap. (C) The person in the picture is fishing. (D) The water looks clear blue.
(A) The two people in the picture are fishing. (B) The crop they are working on looks like corn. (C) The workers are up to their waist in water. (D) One of the workers is wearing a purple shirt.
(A) The boy and man are looking at each other. (B) Both people are getting ready to fish. (C) The man is wearing long pants. (D) There are two boats tied to the dock.
